snippet.title: Prison City (Retroware, Programancer) // The Mini Indie Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
As former cop Hal Bruzer, accept the Chief’s plea to raid Prison City’s security zones and end the Techno-Terrorists’ reign. Inspired by NES action platformers, Prison City is a side-scrolling dystopian experience exploding with tight mechanics, clever level design, and a satisfying narrative.

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2179860/Prison_City/

The Mini Indie Showcase 2023: https://youtu.be/ANsVkLxB3e0 

Learn more: https://sixoneindie.com/showcase
---------
